titleStmt.title: Some teares dropt ore the herse of the incomparable Prince Henry Duke of Gloucester

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid for Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-lane, and Henry Marsh at the Princes-Armes in Chancery-lane neer Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: In verse - "Fatal Semptember to the Royal Line,".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
